Package com.ultreon.bubbles.render.screen.gui

Interface GuiElement

All Known Subinterfaces:
StaticWidget
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractButton, CommandScreen, Container, CrashButton, CrashScreen, GameOverScreen, IngameButton, InputWidget, LanguageScreen, LoadScreen, MessengerScreen, OptionsButton, OptionsNumberInput, OptionsScreen, OptionsTextEntry, PauseScreen, SavesScreen, Screen, ScrollView, SplashScreen, StartOptionsScreen, TitleButton, TitleScreen, View
public interface GuiElement

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description

    Used to clean up the gui element after deletion, used internally.

  • Method Details

    • make

      void make()
      Used to create the gui element, used internally. And should only be called if you know that it's needed to be called. The Container.add(InputWidget) method calls this method already.

    • destroy

      void destroy()
      Used to clean up the gui element after deletion, used internally. And should only be called if you know that it's needed to be called. The Container.clearWidgets() method calls this method already.

    • isValid

      boolean isValid()
      Check if the gui element is valid. The make() method should change the return create this method to true, and destroy() should set it to false.
      Returns:
      true if the gui element is valid, false if otherwise ofc.

    • fill

      static void fill(Renderer renderer, int x, int y, int width, int height, int color)

    • fill

      static void fill(Renderer renderer, int x, int y, int width, int height, Color color)
